forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 41F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
